entry.title: Thursday night: Light snow. Temperature steady near zero.
entry.summary: Light snow or drizzle. Risk of freezing drizzle overnight. Fog patches. Wind becoming east 30 km/h gusting to 50 after midnight. Temperature steady near zero. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Thursday 11 May 2023

entry.title: Friday: Snow. Temperature falling to minus 3 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Snow and local blowing snow. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature falling to minus 3 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 10 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Thursday 11 May 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Snow and blowing snow. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Snow ending in the evening then cloudy. Blowing snow. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40 increasing to 50 gusting to 70 near midnight. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 9 in the evening and minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Thursday 11 May 2023
